etymologies: late 19th century. From the name of the AntlerMine, Mohave County (Arizona), which is now regarded as the type locality + -ite

definitions: A green copper-containing mineral typically occurring as prismatic or tabular crystals in the oxidized zones of copper deposits.

notes.text: Antlerite is a basic copper sulphate, Cu₃(SO₄)(OH)₄. Crystal system: orthorhombic.
